ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Gather Information") && ISPICKVAL(Status,"Front Office") && $Profile.Name != "System Administrator"
,
ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Delivery") && ISPICKVAL(Status,"Gather Information") && $Profile.Name != "System Administrator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move the Case Status backwards.
